idiriyedi krushikarma departhamenthuwa, pashu sampath sanwardhana mandalaya ha widatha wada satahana wani aayathanawala thakshanika upades me gruha aarthika eekaka diyunu kirimata yoda ganu labe.ek ek gamwala grama niladhari samruddhi sanwardhana niladhari, krushikarma paryeshana ha nishpadana sahakara ha pawul saukhya sewa niladhariniya me siyalu wada katayuthu adhikshanaya karanu labe.pawara athi gruha aarthika eekaka pilibandawa samipa adhikshanayak pawathwa ganimath, gruha aarthika eekakaye katayuthu pilibanda pragathiya manima wartha kirima ha gatalu sandaha upades labadimatath mema niladharin katayuthu karanu labe.
